title: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers | Science & Engineering Kit | Build 20 Models | Learn about Force, Load, Compression, Tension | Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, Blue
descriptions:
Build big ideas that really stand up. The Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers kit turns curious kids into confident creators as they explore the real science behind the world’s most iconic structures.

Why they’ll love it:
- Award-winning learning: Parents’ Choice Gold Award Winner for outstanding educational play.
- 20 hands-on builds: Create bridges and skyscrapers—from truss and arch bridges to cantilever, rope, and suspension designs—plus soaring tower models.
- 285 precision parts: Columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and even catenary elements click together for sturdy, repeatable builds.
- Real engineering concepts: Discover force, load, compression, tension, shear, and bending, and see how strength, stiffness, stability, and optimization for safety and cost work in the real world.
- Guided experiments: A 36-page illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide walks builders through a series of 20 model-building experiments with clear, step-by-step visuals.
- Perfect challenge level: Designed for intermediate builders—engaging, achievable, and deeply rewarding.

STEM skills meet creative confidence. Whether your young engineer dreams of spanning canyons or topping skylines, this blue, lab-tested kit delivers authentic structural engineering in a fun, hands-on way. Build, test, tweak, and learn why great designs don’t just look impressive—they’re engineered to last.
